1536750.name: Holy Chick!
1536750.description:
You’ve just escaped a swarm of angry, bloodthirsty chickens. The thin walls of a lone camper trailer in the desert are all that separates you from your demise.
In front of you lies a flashlight, a floppy disk, and a hamster. Clock’s ticking, hurry up! Can you figure out a way out of this predicament?

WELCOME TO THE CRAZY WORLD OF HOLY CHICK!


  • Short and lighthearted Escape Room game, ideal for newcomers to Virtual Reality
  • Puzzles and traps taking full advantage of VR
  • Bloodthirsty chickens and self-destruction mechanisms keeping you on your toes
  • Hamster-based mechanics
  • Player feedback helps shape the final version of the game
1536750.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
